emuInput.TitMainTitle: Woman handing small vase with flowers or plant to another woman, possibly Mrs. Johnson, in front of banner inscribed "G.L.C. Club, Homestead, Pennsylvania, organized 1912", in Clark Memorial Baptist Church, Homestead
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1962, pg. A14, reads: "HOMESTEAD'S GLC CLUB - Members of he GLC Club of Homestead which celebrated its 50th anniversary last Friday night at Clark Memorial Baptist Church... - Harris Photo."
